pages.title: Two close streams
pages.text:
If you want to have 2 different streams of ants close to each other e.g. (two-way traffic), you can have them in different colours (like red and blue).
This will keep them separated, however at the ends you'll have to space them further apart to fuse them with a white one again.

pages.title: Automation
pages.text:
To fully automate an ant stream you need a couple of things.
First of all you need a self sufficient boxer and unboxer in terms of energy usage.
Second of all you will need 2 streams of ants. One for transporting your items, and another one for transporting the empty boxes from the unboxer back to the boxer on the other side. If you have both of these things, you'll be able to fully automate it!
